name: RADIUS
description:
Made in a month as part of a current objective of mine, RADIUS is:

  • 2:00 Duration
  • 1v1 and 2v2
  • Local Multiplayer
  • Air Hockey + Foosball Hybrid
  • Multiple Maps
Controls
  • REGISTER CONTROLLER -- Start Button
  • MOVE GOALIE -- Left Analog (P1) / Right Analog (P2)
  • MOVE FRONTLINE -- Right Analog (P1) / Left Analog (P1)
  • PLAYERS 3/4 -- Left Analog (Leftmost) / Right Analog (Rightmost)
Credits

Art: Wheelsmif (myself)
Sounds: Wheelsmif (myself) via Chiptone
Music: Xyilent - Arp Synth (on repeat)
